title: Coraggio Italia - Wikipedia
snippet: Coraggio Italia (lit. 'Courage Italy', also translatable as 'Cheer up Italy', CI) is a liberal-conservative political party in Italy, led by Luigi Brugnaro. In February 2021, amid the formation of Mario Draghi's national unity government, Cambiamo!

title: Our Campaigns - Political Party - Emilia Romagna Coraggiosa (ERC)
Elly Schlein voted leader of Italy’s most important leftwing party in surprise win | Italy | The Guardian
snippet: Schlein, a former MEP, first came to prominence in early 2020 after her small party, Coraggiosa (Courageous), played a pivotal role in stopping the far right from seizing power in the traditionally leftwing Emilia-Romagna region.

title: Colorado Party - Military
snippet: The Colorado Party (Asociacion Nacional Republicana, or ANR) was founded in 1887, one month after rival politicians formed the Liberal Party (Partido Liberal Radical Autentico, or PLRA). In power since 1947, By 2006 the Colorados had ruled for more consecutive years than any other party in ...
